page.title: 15W.Lough.-Crossing Patrol.
page.content: The School Crossing lady's real title is the School Crossing Patrol,but she is better known as{The Lollipop Lady.} There are also School Crossing men.We need these people to help us cross a busy road to get to school. My mum is a Lollipop Lady.She has been doing this job for twelve years,for the children of{Booth Wood} Primary School. She wears a uniform so that people know that she is a Lollipop Lady.She has a white coat which is waterproof. If the weather is foggy she wears a bright orange coat which shows up,so that cars can see her standing in the middle of the road.She wears a hat with{School Crossing Patrol}written on.She also has a pole with a circular top with{STOP CHILDREN}written on it.
